title: Willow
description: Website design in html and tailwind css for recruitment task.

title: Slaider
description: Slider project written in java script with pagination and autoplay.

title: List task
description: A simple task list project in vanilla java script. Ability to add, remove , uncheck and hide tasks.

title: List task react
description: A more extensive task list built on react using redux, redux-saga and react-router. Includes searching, filtering tasks, downloading sample tasks and writing to localstorage.

title: Currency converter
description: The website contains form to convert currency. There are available all currencies from European Central Bank.

title: Movies browser
description: Movies browser application was created as a final project in the course 'Frontend Developer from scratch' led by Youcode. The app is used to browse and search for movies, actors and film crew. Additionally, it is possible to change the background color, as well as a choice of languages. The application also allows you to quickly return to the top of the page using the 'arrow'.

title: One page - eurocash
description: Simple one page linking to the application download.

title: Frostpunk2
description: Project of the page representing the computer game.

title: Lerg
description: A product page for a specific industry that includes, among other things, a blog. It was taken over by me in the initial phase.

title: Czas na m≈Çodych
description: A more elaborate site with multiple taxonomies and an admin panel. I was responsible for the frontend part.

title: Apetigo - landing page
description: The website contains form to convert currency. There are available all currencies from European Central Bank.

title: Qr apetigo
